title: The Desperado

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose two targets to challenge to a Gunfight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only call for a Gunfight twice. You may not call for a Gunfight on night 1.
- After calling a Gunfight, there will be no vote to hang. Instead, it'll be replaced by a Gunfight. It's publicly announced that you and the two targets are in the Gunfight.
- It is not revealed who enacted the Gunfight.
- In a Gunfight, all participants may choose another participant to target. They may also abstain from targeting anyone.
- At the end of the day, all participants deal an unstoppable attack to their target and clean them. It's revealed who shot who.
